Question: LG Electronics IT CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LG Electronics

Product 1: LG Gram Pro Laptops
 - Super-light design
 - High-end specifications
 - Ultra-lightweight for portability

Product 2: LG UltraGear 32GS95UE Monitor
 - World's First 4K OLED Gaming Monitor
 - Dual Mode Feature

Product 3: LG UltraGear 39GS95QE Monitor
 - 21:9 Aspect Ratio
 - CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree

Product 4: LG C4 Television
 - 144Hz refresh rate
 - HDMI 2.1 connections
 - Excellent game mode
 - Available in sizes from 42 to 83 inches

Additional Highlight: Immersive webOS Experience Zone at CES 2024
